task.title: How to Make a College Breakfast
task.shortdesc: Most college students will not have any time to have a complex breakfast. These instructions are to help with creating the most simple breakfast that a person could make, so they can still get the energy they need to work through the day!

prereq.p: In order to complete this task, you will need:
prereq.div: Warning: If allergic to milk, do not use these instructions

step.cmd: Grab your spoon and bowl from the kitchen counter
Put your utensils close to you and somewhere accesible
Grab and open your cereal box
Pour the desired amount of cereal you want into the bowl
Get the milk out from the fridge
Open the milk by twisting the cap on the top
Pour the milk into the bowl with cereal with desired amount
Use your spoon to enjoy your cereal
